column5: I hear that the fishing show is back on in Feburary.  It is going to be on the new long weekend.  Has anybody else heard this
We have a new long weekend?
http://www.thestar.com/OntarioElection/article/266163  I think it might be Ontario only Roy.  Charles
I don't care much for the long weekend. I want to know about the show!!  When? Where? How Much?????  oops maybe I shouldn't ask.    dsn
I was under the impression it had been combined with the Sportsmans Show that takes place March 12-16.
This fishing show is being run by Andy Pallota, the guy that runs the CSFL BASS tournaments.

The guy that runs the Sportmanshow, bought the rights to the spring fishing show.  His intentions were to shut down the show for the spring, combine the attendance for the sportsmanshow, up the price for the ticket and charge the booths more money..ETC ETC  You wait and see what we do this year a t the sportsman show....  Its going to be a differeent show for US..  Dave
Ya that wierd.. ill see if i can figure out whats going on...  and nope.. no booth this year...

Saw a poster for it at fishing world the other day.  Maybe it's called a fishing and boat show they can get away with it and give some competition to the sportsman's show?  Sportsman's show is supposed to fund conservation, I just hope that more of the proceeds go to conservation than lining of the sponsors pocket.  Wonder why any of these shows are so costly, both for the vendors and the admission fees?
Wow if that all happends it'll ruin the fishing show's for sure. So much for fun.It's exspensive as it is. Then I just won't bother going and just visit the local fishing stores for my stuff.  dsn

Yup .. by the time you drive there pay the entrance fee .. buy some lunch you can get what you want alot cheeper from the local guys .. unless of course you are looking for a big ticket item which they prob wont have there anyways

The only great thing with the show is that you can barter. LOL I did with bait rocket. I told the place where I bought it from some other place was selling it cheaper and I wantted a refund. He looked at me.  And said ok well match it. And gave back the bounce. That was the only good thing about all the stores being together.  dsn
